title: Altrincham
name: Altrincham Ice Rink
directions: At the rear of the railway station
phone: 08700 852929 (premium rate number from most mobiles and non-BT landlines)
content: Silver Blades Altrincham is open 7 days a week including bank holidays and is home for all ice disciplines including general public skating, figure skating, ice dancing, speed skating and ice hockey.
